settings.title: Evohome settings
settings.intro: Before you can add your thermostats you need to enter your username and password for Evohome first. These settings are stored locally on your Homey.

messages.busySaving: Account settings valid, saving to Homey...
messages.confirmClearAccount: Are you sure you want to clear the account? Configured devices will stop working.

errorValidation.429: Too many attempts, please wait some minutes before trying again

messages.errorSaving: Error saving account settings to Homey

start.title: Add Evohome thermostat device
start.intro: If a valid account is configured in the app settings sections of Homey, the Evohome thermostats will be listed.

messages.errorNoSettings: No account configured in the app settings section.
messages.errorInvalidSettings: Invalid account configured in the app settings sections.
